room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: My friends and I went here for a friend's birthday, and we got to be the first ones to play the Runaway Train room. It was so much fun! It was the most amazing time, and it was better than I ever imagined for my first ever escape room. I'm already making plans for the next time we visit.

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: This was our second escape room for five of us. We had a great time. We did the Runaway Train. The puzzles were challenging but solvable, which is important. We did get out, but at one point it seemed pretty bleak until one of us had a breakthrough that kept us going. It is a fast-paced hour, but still time to have fun and laugh at each other.

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: I went with a group of friends and had a blast. We did the Runaway Train scenario. Be sure to schedule in advance. Check in was easy and the young woman who was our monitors was great.

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: Great time! Truly appreciated the fact that we could have a room to ourselves as a couple on a date for a great price!
